docs.snippet: When it's Kentucky Derby season in Louisville, money seems to flow faster than the Ohio River. Hotels and restaurants fill up; bars serve mint juleps and fine Kentucky bourbon. Shopping includes a hunt for the colorful hats worn as a Derby traditi...
docs.lead_paragraph: When it's Kentucky Derby season in Louisville, money seems to flow faster than the Ohio River. Hotels and restaurants fill up; bars serve mint juleps and fine Kentucky bourbon. Shopping includes a hunt for the colorful hats worn as a Derby tradition. Parties are thrown, and wagers are plunked down on can't-miss colts and longshots alike as fans guess which horse will win the famous race at Churchill Downs.

headline.main: Louisville: 5 Free Things for Visitors to Do
headline.print_headline: Louisville: 5 Free Things for Visitors to Do

docs.snippet: Eric and Charlotte Kaufman had already struggled for days, pounded by waves, aboard their disabled sailboat by the time skydiving National Guardsmen answered their distress call from hundreds of miles off the Mexican coast, and their vomiting, fev...
docs.lead_paragraph: Eric and Charlotte Kaufman had already struggled for days, pounded by waves, aboard their disabled sailboat by the time skydiving National Guardsmen answered their distress call from hundreds of miles off the Mexican coast, and their vomiting, feverish, 1-year-old daughter could not have withstood much more.

headline.main: Rough Seas Prolonged Rescue of Family, Sick Baby
headline.print_headline: Rough Seas Prolonged Rescue of Family, Sick Baby

docs.snippet: National Guardsmen, three federal agencies, a plane and a frigate assisted in the rescue of the Kaufmans, who called for help when their 1-year-old daughter became ill....
docs.lead_paragraph: National Guardsmen, three federal agencies, a plane and a frigate assisted in the rescue of the Kaufmans, who called for help when their 1-year-old daughter became ill.
docs.abstract: Eric and Charlotte Kaufman and their two children are safely rescued by Navy warship six days after the family found itself helpless and adrift in a sailboat far into the Pacific; family returns to San Diego, where they had begun their attempted around-the-world voyage before their 1-year-old daughter, whose illness prompted the rescue, was born.

headline.main: Rescued at Sea, Family Is Safe in San Diego
headline.print_headline: Rescued at Sea, Family Is Safe in San Diego

docs.snippet: The Rock and Roll Hall of Fame inductions take place on Thursday in Brooklyn: Just how does the selection process work?...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Rock and Roll Hall of Fame inductions take place on Thursday in Brooklyn: Just how does the selection process work?
docs.abstract: New crop of inductees to the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame embody ongoing debate about the selection process, specifically whether it should favor popularity or excellence now that many of gene's giants have already been inducted; upcoming ceremony at Barclays Center in Brooklyn will include Kiss, Nirvana, Peter Gabriel, Linda Ronstadt, Cat Stevens and Hall & Oates.

headline.main: Hall of Fame Decides Who Rocks, Officially

docs.snippet: Berlin’s new airport is attracting tourists after a series of delays and bungles have driven its cost billions of dollars over budget and pushed its opening back indefinitely....
docs.lead_paragraph: Berlin’s new airport is attracting tourists after a series of delays and bungles have driven its cost billions of dollars over budget and pushed its opening back indefinitely.
docs.abstract: Berlin Journal; Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt Airport is attracting tourists after series of delays and bungles have driven its cost billions of dollars over budget and pushed its opening back indefinitely; part of the appeal seems to be the chance to gawk at evidence that Germany, practically synonymous with precision and efficiency, could fail in such a spectacular fashion.

headline.seo: Berlin’s Over-Budget, Behind-Schedule Airport Becomes an Attraction
headline.main: In a Land of On-Time Arrivals, a Tour of Anything But
